entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Buchans
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
